name: P.U.T.K.I - Where Legends Are Made
description:
The pipes are overflowing, it's time to get out. Use your "advanced" acrobatics to get back to the surface. Beware of the leaf-throwing apple monsters.

Tools: 

  • UE 2.47
  • Blender
  • Affinity Photo
  • Quixel Mixer + Bridge
  • Bandlab
  • Audacity
  • Clip Studio
  • UE marketplace: ProInstance Tools Plugin
  • Gimp
  • DaVinci Resolve
  • Git

Asset: All created during the jam by us.

Credits: Rami "Shrimberg" Inberg and Panu "CyberKarhu" Puurunen

 #UnrealJam
